person.name: Judi Bechard
person.bio: Judi holds qualifications in Information Systems having spent 12 years working internationally for corporations as a Technical Specialist in the field of Information Technology. Judi Bechard is also a certified and experienced Intuitive Consultant and Healing Therapist, working with clients in 8 countries and counting. In addition to her current private practice, Judi is the Director of HealthCare Victoria, a community resource providing access to over 1600 natural healthcare providers. Ambassador fell in love with Threefold It was love at first byte! When you know, you know.ThreeFold has an admirable and worthy mission to expand and revolutionize the way the global community connects online in a responsible, sustainable, future-minded way.
person.excerpt: Judi holds qualifications in Information Systems having spent 12 years working internationally.
